messages.title: Time for Positive Politics
messages.content: The Green Party promises a positive politics that deals with policies not just the personalities. At this coming election, the Greens offer a refreshing alternative and a chance of a real change for good.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Restore funding to local councils to protect and improve local services and green spaces
Reverse Labour/Tory NHS privatisations, providing free social care for the over 65s
Bring the railways and the energy companies under public control for the public good
Invest in renewable energy technology creating a quarter of a million new jobs
Build half a million new homes, scrap the Bedroom Tax, and introduce fair rent caps

issues.economy: An economy that works for all.

leaflet.personalStatement: The Greens will change politics? - Martin Dobson

images.caption: Martin Dobson for the common good.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed on recycled paper and delivered for free by volunteers.
